mapper.sql: user_zm.id AS userZm_id, user_zm.user_id AS userZm_userId, user_zm.real_name AS userZm_realName, user_zm.zm_score AS userZm_zmScore, user_zm.jiebei_amount AS userZm_jiebeiAmount, user_zm.huabei_total_amount AS userZm_huabeiTotalAmount, user_zm.huabei_avail_amount AS userZm_huabeiAvailAmount, user_zm.gmt_datetime AS userZm_gmtDatetime, user_zm.upt_datetime AS userZm_uptDatetime

id AS id, user_id AS userId, real_name AS realName, zm_score AS zmScore, jiebei_amount AS jiebeiAmount, huabei_total_amount AS huabeiTotalAmount, huabei_avail_amount AS huabeiAvailAmount, gmt_datetime AS gmtDatetime, upt_datetime AS uptDatetime
mapper.select: select , `user`.real_name AS user_realName, `user`.phone AS user_phone from user_zm,authentication,user WHERE user_zm.user_id=authentication.user_id AND user_zm.user_id=user.id AND `user_zm`.`status`='使用' AND `user`.`phone` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{phone}),'%') AND `user`.`real_name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{realName}),'%') AND authentication.auditor_id=#{adminId} AND datediff(user_zm.gmt_datetime,#{time1}) >=0 AND datediff(user_zm.gmt_datetime,#{time2}) <=0 AND `user_zm`.`status`='使用' ORDER BY user_zm.gmt_datetime DESC LIMIT ${pageNo},${pageSize}

select COUNT(*) from user_zm,authentication,user WHERE user_zm.user_id=authentication.user_id AND user_zm.user_id=user.id AND `user_zm`.`status`='使用' AND `user`.`phone` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{phone}),'%') AND `user`.`real_name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{realName}),'%') AND authentication.auditor_id=#{adminId} AND datediff(user_zm.gmt_datetime,#{time1}) >=0 AND datediff(user_zm.gmt_datetime,#{time2}) <=0
